feature.label: ECF OSGi 4.2 Remote Services Examples
feature.description: This feature provides ECF Remote Service Examples. These are examples of the use of OSGi 4.2 Remote Services. OSGi 4.2 Remote Services is specified in the OSGi 4.2 compendium. See http://www.osgi.org/download/r4v42/r4.cmpn.pdf.
